HomePage.title: Your achievements in the gym, in sports, and much more, all in one link.
HomePage.text: Movete is the link you can share on all your other social networks. Here, you can showcase all your achievements in the gym, soccer, basketball, and much more, receive invitations to train, and much more. What are you waiting for? Join us and be part of this great project!
HomePage.errorEmailShort: The email is too long, please try another one.
HomePage.successMessage: Welcome to the Movete community, we will notify you by email when everything is ready and don't forget to keep training hard.
HomePage.generalError: Sorry, there seems to have been an error, please try again or try again later.
